reg_mobile_message: Please provide the details requested below to proceed. Ensure that the information you provide is associated with your employment data.

forgot_mainforgot: Please enter your mobile number or email address associated with your employee information to regenerate a new 4 digit PIN.
forgot_mainresend: Please enter your mobile number or email address associated with your employee information to resend the PIN.
forgot_mainplaceholder: Enter mobile number or email id
forgot_alert: Please enter a valid mobile number or email
new_pin: A newly generated PIN has been sent to your mobile number and email.
new_resentpin: Your 4-digit PIN has been sent to your mobile number and email.
tooltip: Please use the 4-digit PIN you have received via SMS or email.
issue_optional_desc: Provide additional details or context to enhance clarity
telluswrong: Tell us what went wrong in
thankyoumessage: Your grievance is registered with us.
forgot_main: Please enter your mobile number or email address associated with your employee information to regenerate a new 4 digit PIN.
add_details_to_incident: Add more detail to this grievance
gustmessageint: Please choose from the list below to access the relevant audit forms. Your participation is vital in ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety in healthcare.
chooseCategory: Select the relevant audit form to input data
initial_assesment: 1. PSQ3a - Time taken for initial assessment of indoor patients
report_error: 2. PSQ3a - Number of reporting errors per 1000 investigations
safety_precautions: 3. PSQ3a - Percentage of adherence to safety precautions by staff working in diagnostics
medication_charts: 5. PSQ3a - Percentage of medication charts with error-prone abbreviations
adverse_drug: 6. PSQ3a - Percentage of in-patients developing adverse drug reaction(s)
unplanned_return: 7. PSQ3a - Percentage of unplanned return to OT
wrong_surgery: 8. PSQ3a - Percentage of surgeries where the organisation's procedure to prevent adverse events like wrong site, wrong patient and wrong surgery have been adhered to
mortality_ratio: 10. PSQ3a - Standardised Mortality Ratio for ICU
theemergency: 11. PSQ3a - Return to theemergency department within 72 hours with similar presenting complaints
ulcers: 12. PSQ3a - Incidence of hospital associated pressure ulcers after admission (Bed sore per 1000 patient days)
urinary: 13. PSQ3b - Catheter associated Urinary tract infection rate
blood_infection: 15. PSQ3b - Central line - associated Blood stream infection rate
prophylactic: 18. PSQ3b - Percentage of cases who received appropriate prophylactic antibiotics within the specified timeframe
re_scheduling: 19. PSQ3c - Percentage of re- scheduling of surgeries
blood_components: 20. PSQ3c - Turnaround time for issue of blood and blood components
nurse_patient: 21. PSQ3c - Nurse-patient ratio for ICUs and wards
consultation: 22. PSQ3c - Waiting time for out- patient consultation
medical_records: 25. PSQ4c - Percentage of medical records having incomplete and/or improper consent
emergency_medications: 26. PSQ4c - Stock out Rate of Emergency medications
mock_drills: 27. PSQ4d - Number of variations observed in mock drills
patient_fall: 28. PSQ4d - Patient fall rate (Falls per 1000 patient days)
stick_injuries: 30. PSQ3d - Incidence of needle stick injuries
shift_change: 31. PSQ3d - Appropriate handovers during shift change (To be done separately for doctors and nurses) - (per patient per shift)
prescription: 32. PSQ3d - Compliance rate to Medication Prescription in capitals
